tha-ap87:1.2_0: from the eon nor what’s allowable.
tha-ap87:2.1_0: A golden skin has been golden,
tha-ap87:2.3_0: Having seen the danger in the future,
tha-ap87:3.4_0: I bowed with my head to your feet.
tha-ap87:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap87:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap87:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Sisī.
tha-ap87:7.1_0: for the most senior monk who has been laid down.
